title: Worlds 2017 Shop
body: I got that shop before the reset, and these are just awesome skins. I bought me a paysafecard yesterday tehn i aw that the shop got reseted, now i have just trash skins. Are you serious riot??? I want my good skins and not that trash. I used my Money for the good skins not for that. Please give me my old shop back!

replies.body:
We won't be able to change the shop back to the old one, but if you shoot us a ticket letting us know 2 things we can help out with getting those skins you wanted:

1) Which skins you wanted to buy
2) Confirm you're okay with us removing the RP cost of those skins for you and adding the skins
